description: Intelligently position elements on a page.

methods.name: isClickWithinOverlayOrChildren
methods.docblock:
Disable Tether if a user clicks outside of the `overlay` and `children`.
@param {Object} event - Click event
methods.description: Disable Tether if a user clicks outside of the `overlay` and `children`.

behavior.description: Event to listen to and open the overlay

children.description: Element that the `overlay` should attach to

horizontalAttachment.description: Side of the `overlay` that should attach to the `children`

horizontalTargetAttachment.description: Side of `children` that should attach to the `overlay`

isConstrainedToScreen.description: Attach `overlay` to an edge of the screen if it is going to move off

onHide.description:
Function that runs when the `overlay` is hidden. Return `false` to prevent
the `overlay` from closing.

onShow.description: Function that runs when the `overlay` is shown

overlay.description: The element that is attached to the children

shouldHideOnClick.description: Should the `overlay` close when clicking outside of it

verticalAttachment.description: Vertical edge of the `overlay` that should touch the `children`

verticalTargetAttachment.description: Vertical edge of the `children` that should touch the `overlay`
